00017 #ifndef BT_SOLVE_PROJECTED_GAUSS_SEIDEL_H
00018 #define BT_SOLVE_PROJECTED_GAUSS_SEIDEL_H
00019 
00020 
00021 #include "btMLCPSolverInterface.h"
00022 
00024 class btSolveProjectedGaussSeidel : public btMLCPSolverInterface
00025 {
00026 
00027 public:
00028 
00029         btScalar m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold;
00030         btScalar m_leastSquaresResidual;
00031 
00032         btSolveProjectedGaussSeidel()
00033                 :m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold(0),
00034                 m_leastSquaresResidual(0)
00035         {
00036         }
00037 
00038         virtual bool solveMLCP(const btMatrixXu & A, const btVectorXu & b, btVectorXu& x, const btVectorXu & lo,const btVectorXu & hi,const btAlignedObjectArray<int>& limitDependency, int numIterations, bool useSparsity = true)
00039         {
00040                 if (!A.rows())
00041                         return true;
00042                 //the A matrix is sparse, so compute the non-zero elements
00043                 A.rowComputeNonZeroElements();
00044 
00045                 //A is a m-n matrix, m rows, n columns
00046                 btAssert(A.rows() == b.rows());
00047 
00048                 int i, j, numRows = A.rows();
00049         
00050                 btScalar delta;
00051 
00052                 for (int k = 0; k <numIterations; k++)
00053                 {
00054                         m_leastSquaresResidual = 0.f;
00055                         for (i = 0; i <numRows; i++)
00056                         {
00057                                 delta = 0.0f;
00058                                 if (useSparsity)
00059                                 {
00060                                         for (int h=0;h<A.m_rowNonZeroElements1[i].size();h++)
00061                                         {
00062                                                 int j = A.m_rowNonZeroElements1[i][h];
00063                                                 if (j != i)//skip main diagonal
00064                                                 {
00065                                                         delta += A(i,j) * x[j];
00066                                                 }
00067                                         }
00068                                 } else
00069                                 {
00070                                         for (j = 0; j <i; j++) 
00071                                                 delta += A(i,j) * x[j];
00072                                         for (j = i+1; j<numRows; j++) 
00073                                                 delta += A(i,j) * x[j];
00074                                 }
00075 
00076                                 btScalar aDiag = A(i,i);
00077                                 btScalar xOld = x[i];
00078                                 x [i] = (b [i] - delta) / aDiag;
00079                                 btScalar s = 1.f;
00080 
00081                                 if (limitDependency[i]>=0)
00082                                 {
00083                                         s = x[limitDependency[i]];
00084                                         if (s<0)
00085                                                 s=1;
00086                                 }
00087                         
00088                                 if (x[i]<lo[i]*s)
00089                                         x[i]=lo[i]*s;
00090                                 if (x[i]>hi[i]*s)
00091                                         x[i]=hi[i]*s;
00092                                 btScalar diff = x[i] - xOld;
00093                                 m_leastSquaresResidual += diff*diff;
00094                         }
00095 
00096                         btScalar eps  = m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold;
00097                         if ((m_leastSquaresResidual < eps) || (k >=(numIterations-1)))
00098                         {
00099 #ifdef VERBOSE_PRINTF_RESIDUAL
00100                                 printf("totalLenSqr = %f at iteration #%d\n", m_leastSquaresResidual,k);
00101 #endif
00102                                 break;
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105                 return true;
00106         }
00107 
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif //BT_SOLVE_PROJECTED_GAUSS_SEIDEL_H
